details:
A vulnerability exists in Google  Apigee's JavaCallout policy https://docs.apigee.com/api-platform/reference/policies/java-callout-policy  that allows for remote code execution.

It is possible for a user to write a JavaCallout that injected a malicious object into the MessageContext to execute arbitrary Java code and system commands at runtime,Â leading to unauthorized access to data, lateral movement within the network, and access to backend systems.

The Apigee hybrid versions below have all been updated to protect from this vulnerability:
  *  Hybrid_1.11.2+
  *  Hybrid_1.12.4+
  *  Hybrid_1.13.3+
  *  Hybrid_1.14.1+
  *  OPDK_5202+
  *  OPDK_5300+
